original: Goldberg Ligner & Shyster was founded on the ideal that no man is beyond judgement.  Our firm has endeavored to seek out corruption and vice in the highest echelons of society.
Coming from founder Tom Goldberg's dream to level the playing field, GL&S has amassed one of the most impressive records in the legal industry.
translated: 怀揣着创始人Tom Goldberg创造公平竞争环境的初衷，GLS已经在法律行业积累了数一数二的记录。

original: Our firm has successfully litigated against CEOs, politicians, priests, community leaders, and charities.  GL&S believe that corruption is always there, you just have to look for it.
translated: 我们事务所成功起诉过CEO，政客，牧师，社区领袖和慈善机构。GLS相信腐败永远都有，需要的是一双发现腐败的眼睛。

original: Following the example of founder Tom Goldberg, GL&S has an active interest in the community.  A significant amount of work is done without taking fee; however, we feel that all of our practice is pro bono publico.
translated: 以创始人Tom Goldberg为榜样，GLS律所积极关注社区。大量的工作是无偿完成的。实际上，可以说我们的所有业务都是公益性的。

original: A portion of the firm's turnover is donated to Goldberg's Guys - an organization dedicated to teaching young disadvantaged boys to swim.  Tom Goldberg set up this charity several years ago, and still has a very hands-on role within it.
translated: 事务所将部分收入捐赠给了「Goldberg的小伙伴」，一个致力于教自由城的困难男童游泳的组织。Tom Goldberg在几年前建立了这个慈善组织，至今仍然亲自参与其中。

original: We are located at 44 Amethyst Street, 1st floor, The Exchange, Algonquin, Liberty City .
translated: 我们的地址：自由城，Algonquin，证交区，Amethyst街44号一楼

original: GL&S, All Rights Reserved . Privacy Statement . Contact Info
